title: Board ban
body:
So I'm collecting perma bans on boards.
Thus far, I'm banned on Eune and Euw, and soon, on NA.
It's time for OCE.

Please, spare me calling you names and posting bad stuff, just call out the mods and do the thing.

btw. Are there any more boards besides those I mentioned?

replies.body: That's pretty pathetic don't you have anything better to do with your time
You know what's pathetic? Your bronze 2.

> [{quoted}](name=SiffLort,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Nwx3o0Ap,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-10-04T05:41:49.231+0000)
>
> You know what's pathetic? Your bronze 2.

You're*

You're a low-quality troll.
Your as in your possession you fucking retard.
Mozzie doesn't own Bronze 2. It's a virtual representation of skill. "You are" is the correct wording, in this instance.

I do realise more than half of OCE is mentally challenged, but at least try to understand a simple instance. Your bronze, as in your DIVISION. Last time I checked you don't have to own a division to be able to say 'your division is bad'. Oh well, this is OCE, everything is possible here.
I refues to believe you are this much retarded to not understand this.

\*claims "your" implies possession\*
\*proceeds to claim someone doesn't have to own something for "your" to be applicable\*
Congratulations! You just contradicted yourself.
Why won't you die from cancer already, trash?

In order to die from cancer, one would have to contract cancer. Since I am (*apparently*) trash, I am incapable of contracting cancer and, therefore, incapable of dying from it.

Fortunate for me, unfortunate for you.
Trash is incapable of typing as well, yet you persist to do so. What a contradiction, m8.
I am *sentient* trash, I'll type if I want to.
Hey you don't know that. I've spent a lot of time here and I'd like to think I could own Bronze 2 if I wanted
I think this might be the first time I'm overjoyed to see you show up
That's the best you got? It's like  watching Trump do exercise embarrassing and depressing
Bronze 2 oceanic boys. This is where the magic happens.
Mozzie may be in Bronze, but their troll game is far superior to yours.
Come on, I refuse to be a part of this retarded community. Perma ban me. What else do I need to say? OCE is pretty much cancer of LoL with thier shitty players. Cancer to all of you.

Legit was trying to find the times for the finals and found you
My god, i thought i was toxic, but you're  like the trump of toxcity, what the hek?
Aren't you just the coolest kid ðŸ™ƒ
There are the PBE Boards, BR Boards, KR Boards, JP Boards (or whatever the Japanese server is). I'm not sure if Garena have a Board, but they might.

Damn, how can I get a perma from BR and japan, I can't speak their languages.

Oh btw, your OCE boards suck big time. How long do I have to wait for a reply? A week?

edit
nvm, I can't post in BR or any other region but here, EUW/EUNE and NA. Guess that will have to do.
